featured.text: He was also known to have entertained the slaves who built the pyramids.

definition.zh_def: 金字塔：一種多面體，通常有四個三角形的側面和一個底面，形狀像一個尖頂的結構。
definition.en_def: A pyramid is a solid geometric figure with a polygonal base and triangular faces that converge at a single point called the apex.
definition.example: The ancient Egyptians built massive pyramids as tombs for their pharaohs.
